【Compatible with Various OS】 Once finishing configuration on Windows or Mac system, it can be used in various devices including iOS, Android, Windows ALL, Linux, Mac. HID device, you can delete the software after configuration.

Solid design and in-mold injection, improve the waterproof and moistureproof ability. Photoelectric equipment for a quiet and better using experience.
【PCsensor SERVICE】PCsensor stands behind every item it sells and also provides lifetime technical support, 24/7 service. All our products have obtained FCC, CE, ROSH certification.

product_description: "1. Keyboard: PC sees the pedals as an additional keyboard. The software used to set up the pedals does not need to be running once you have them set up to the keys you want. You can map via the USB keyboard or virtual keyboard within the program. It can be program any single key, shortcut key, hotkey or key combination (including F13 to F24, etc.), such as Alt-Tab etc. It has options for single trigger or continuous, from either depression or release of the pedals. Can do any key combo needed as well, this will work in most situations for whatever you want it to do. 2. Mouse: PC sees the pedal as an additional mouse, can be program the left, middle, right, forward, and backward of the mouse, and the movement of the X and Y axes and the up and down scrolling functions of the wheel can also be assign. 3. String: Type up to 38 characters with a single press by the foot pedal, for example ""Good morning, I love you,darling !"" 4. Multimedia: PC foot pedal supports multimedia functions, such as previous song, next song, volume＋, volume－, Pause/Play etc. 5. Game Can be program any key in your game or for your controller, can be use this for push to talk while game , muting Discord and/or game chat when playing. After the completion of set up, the switch can be used on the following operating systems: (l)Dos (2)Win 2000 (3)Win xp (4)Win 7 (5)Win 8 (6)Win 10 (7) Win 11 (8)Linux (9)MAC NOTE: Our software can be support windows system and Mac. Just download from our website,Once the pedals are configured in Windows PC or Mac, it's completely plug and play in other system.
